item.description: 生成与验证 data: 自定义数据, 如 {'username':user_name, 'user_id': user_info.id} 验证通过后在payload中获取 import jwt from datetime import datetime,timedelta SECRECT_KEY = b'\x92R!\x8e\xc6\x9c\xb3\x89#\xa6\x0c\xcb\xf6\xcb\xd7\xc' def genToken(data): expInt = datetime.utcnow() + timedelta(days=1) iat = datetime.utcnow() payload = { 'exp': expInt, 'iat': iat, 'data': data } token = jwt.encode(payload, key = SECRECT_KEY, algorithm='HS256') return bytes.decode(token)
